import { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link ,Navigate} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios'; export default function Dashboard() { const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:3001/verifyPreview/preview') .then(result => { console.log(result); if (result.data !== "success") { navigate('/'); } }) .catch(err => { console.log('Error during preview verification:', err); // Optional: You might want to navigate to an error page or handle it more gracefully }); }, [navigate]); return ( <>
